H0.text: what government did the roman empire have. Oligarchy

H1.text: what government did the roman empire have. Aristocracy

H2.text: what government did the roman empire have. Theocracy

H3.text: what government did the roman empire have. Monarchy

A4.text: The dominance of the emperor was based on the consolidation of powers from several republican offices.

A5.text: The emperor made himself the central religious authority as pontifex maximus, and centralized the right to declare war, ratify treaties, and negotiate with foreign leaders.
